text: Not sure of why the bad reviews. Receptionist was friendly and Dr Audrey was amazing too. My daughter‚Äôs eczema got better with their help. Thank you!
They were the only clinic gracious enough to take in a last minute appointment and I got all the medications I needed. The only drawback is that credit card payment isn‚Äôt accepted.
Dr Roland Chu is super patient, kind and professional in his diagnosis. He gave me a lot of confidence that my skin condition is gonna recover. I feel so well taken care of

My daughter visited the clinic end of July and she took the allergic test. My daughter emphasise tt she is going bk to Japan and the receptionist (young lady) took down her email add and said they will email her the result. One month over my daughter still did not receive the result. I called and the receptionist (old lady) said there is no indication tt they shld email the result. I said then why they took her email add? Then she still wants to give excuse saying doctor on leave. I said it has been one month aldy, they shld follow up even doctor is on leave. The she admits tt they overlooked. I think this is not professional.

My mum experienced itchy skin with lots of bumps all over her body include the scalp for almost a year. She had consulted a number of doctors as well as taking Chinese herbs with no effects. Dr Goh of Loke Skin clinic is able to detect the root causes of her issue on 1st visit, and prescribed her to treat it. Everything was done professionally and effectively. My mum is well with only 2 weeks medication & creams. üëçüèª
